dict.acceptation: 冰箱；冷藏库；制冰机，冷冻机；

sent.orig: Refrigerator side-panel is a main component of refrigerator, which cost affects the total cost of refrigerator.
sent.trans: 冰箱侧帮是冰箱的一个主要部件，其成本是冰箱整体成本的一个重要影响因素。

sent.orig: The utility model can be produced matched the refrigerator, also be installed the sold refrigerator.
sent.trans: 可以和冰箱配套生产，也可以装在已售出的冰箱内。

sent.orig: Clean out refrigerator. Clean under refrigerator and freezer.
sent.trans: 清理冰箱。清扫冰箱和冰柜底下。

sent.orig: However, the HFC—134a refrigerator consumed about 4％ more electricity than the CFC—12 refrigerator.
sent.trans: 但用HFC——134a时的耗电量约比CFC——12增加4％。

sent.orig: Did you say the refrigerator, put the elephant and close the refrigerator?
sent.trans: 那你要怎么把大象放到一个冰箱里去呢？
